item.title: Organize Your Emails in Bulk With Gmail Search Operators + Python Libraries
item.description:
After 12 years with Gmail as my primary email inbox, I wanted to clear out old "Promotions" emails. This can be done with some clever use of Gmail's search syntax shown below.

I wanted to preserve my "Starred" emails, but delete old emails to free up space. I was able â€¦
item.dc:creator: pythonmarketer
